title: Reset header emblem using uploaded image

requirements.text: Reset the sticky header/top emblem image to use the newly uploaded emblem image (download-1.jpg) instead of the current generated logo, while keeping the existing advisor text and call CTA unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Header emblem graphic in the sticky top bar is updated to the new uploaded emblem artwork (not the previous /assets/generated/tata-aig-logo.dim_512x512.png).
Advisor text remains visible and unchanged: "Arya Vineeth" and "TATA AIG Advisor".
The call CTA remains unchanged and continues to use tel:9495670101.
The emblem displays cleanly (no distortion), preserves aspect ratio, and fits within the existing header height on mobile and desktop.

requirements.text: Add an optimized static asset version of the uploaded emblem for web use and reference it from the header (place the finalized image under frontend/public/assets/).
acceptanceCriteria: An optimized emblem asset is available under frontend/public/assets/ (e.g., PNG) derived from download-1.jpg.
HeaderTopBar references the new static asset path under /assets/ rather than pointing to the old generated logo path.
Image alt text is English and accurately describes the emblem.

constraints: Do not modify immutable frontend paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not change the configured site slug/domain (must remain "AryaTatainsurance").
Keep backend single-actor architecture unchanged; no backend changes are required for this emblem reset.
nonGoals: Changing phone number or WhatsApp links.
Updating other section imagery (hero illustration, advisor portrait) unless explicitly requested.

edits: Prepare a clean, web-optimized emblem asset (download-1.jpg > header-emblem-reset.dim_512x512.png)
